scripts.tdd: node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive tests --watch src/ tests/
scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive tests
scripts.documentation: node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build src/** -f html -o docs && node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build src/** -f md -o docs/docs.md
scripts.commitdocs: npm run documentation && git add docs/docs.md && git add docs/index.html && git commit -m 'rebuild documentation'
scripts.push: git push origin && git push github
scripts.standalone: npm run prepublish && node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js --standalone tasksf > standalone/tasksf.js && node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js --standalone tasksf | node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs -c > standalone/tasksf.min.js
